mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Mathematics Education for the Future Project
mods:titleInfo.mods:subTitle: Proceedings of the 14th International Conference : Challenges in Mathematics Education for the Next Decade : Sep. 10-15, 2017, Hotel Annabella, Balatonfüred, Hungary

mods:name.mods:namePart: Landesbibliothek Münster / Universitäts- und Landesbibliothek Münster

mods:originInfo.mods:publisher: WTM-Verlag für wissenschaftliche Texte und Medien

mods:mods.mods:abstract: This volume contains the papers presented at the International Conference on Challenges in Mathematics Education for the Next Decade held from September 10-15, 2017 in Balatonfüred, Hungary. The Conference was organized by The Mathematics Education for the Future Project – an international edu­cational project founded in 1986.
